{"step_by_step_thinking": "Bismuth Oxide is known to cause grey discoloration of the crown when incorporated in MTA. Tantalam Oxide is also not a known replacement for Bismuth Oxide in MTA. C. Bismuth Carbonate is not a replacement for Bismuth Oxide in MTA, as it contains Bismuth itself. D.
